name: Multiplayer RTS Prototype Build
description:
INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO PLAY WITH STEAM FRIENDS

1: Make sure you BOTH have a copy of this game.

2: Add the .exe as a Non-Steam game in your Steam library

3: Make sure you are STEAM FRIENDS with whomever you want to play with

4: Have one player Host a lobby

5: Have all joining players launch the game, find the host in their friend's list, click the drop-down next to their name, and select 'Join Game.'

6: Enjoy!

Also, please note that this makes use of the 'SpaceWars' appid so when playing this game, Steam will show that you are instead running SpaceWars and SpaceWars will be added to your library. This is needed in order for a server connection to be made. SpaceWars will NOT harm your PC in any way so don't be alarmed when it appears to be the game Steam says you are playing.
